content:
Access the Article Recommendations Action’s Output

Available in: Lightning Experience. Available in Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited editions.

To use the recommendations, assign the output from the Article Recommendations action to a collection variable. Then, loop through the collection variable to access the recommended articles and their fields.

On the Elements tab, drag the Assignment element onto the canvas.
Assign the JSON output of the Article Recommendations action to an Apex-Defined output variable.
Add a Loop element to iterate through each item in the variable list.
Inside the loop, drag the Get Records element onto the canvas to filter through the Knowledge Article Version Records.

This example filters knowledge articles that aren’t included in the public knowledge base IsVisibleInPkb.
Assign the list of recommended articles to a variable. From there you can use the variable to process the list into a reader-friendly format such as a new screen or email.

Sample Flow to Send Recommended Articles in an Auto-Response Email
When a customer opens a new case, this flow sends case-relevant knowledge articles in an auto-response email.
title: Configuring Article Recommendations in Service Cloud
